00002 /// @file         CTreeNodeArtist.cpp

00010 /// @description  This file contains the implementation of the CTreeNodeArtist
00011 ///               class which is responsible for painting nodes to the screen.
00012 ///

00017 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00018 /// CTreeNodeArtist::CTreeNodeArtist
00019 ///
00020 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CTreeNodeArtist
00021 ///                 class.
00022 /// @pre            None
00023 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00024 ///
00025 /// @param canvas:  This is the area to which all the nodes will be painted.
00026 ///
00027 /// @limitations    None
00028 ///
00029 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 CTreeNodeArtist::CTreeNodeArtist( QPaintDevice *canvas )
00031 {
00032     m_canvas = canvas;
00033     m_model = NULL;
00034     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00035 }
00036

00052 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053 /// CTreeNodeArtist::paintModel
00054 ///
00055 /// @description     This function paints all the nodes to the screen.
00056 /// @pre             None
00057 /// @post            All the nodes are drawn to the screen.
00058 ///
00059 /// @param painter:  This is a pointer to the painter to use.  If no value is
00060 ///                  passed, create a painter to use.
00061 ///
00062 /// @limitations     None
00063 ///
00064 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00065 void CTreeNodeArtist::paintModel( QPainter *painter )
00066 {
00067     //Make sure the pointer to the model has been initialized.
00068     if (m_model != NULL)
00069     {
00070         //This variable is used for painting to the canvas if no painter was
00071         //specified.
00072         QPainter localPainter( m_canvas );
00073 
00074         //Check if the calling function did not pass a painter and use
00075         //the local one in that case.
00076         if ( painter == NULL )
00077             painter = &localPainter;
00078 
00079         //Create the QPainter object to paint the model.
00080         painter->setPen( m_style->getPen() );
00081         painter->setBrush( m_style->getBrush() );
00082         painter->setFont( m_style->getFont() );
00083         painter->setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing );
00084 
00085         //Make sure the root node of the tree isn't NULL, then call the
00086         //paintModelHelper function to pain the model.
00087         if ( m_model->getRootNode() != NULL )
00088             paintModelHelper( m_model->getRootNode(), painter );
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00093 /// CTreeNodeArtist::paintModelHelper
00094 ///
00095 /// @description     This function paints the given node and all its children,
00096 ///                  along with connecting lines up to its parent node by
00097 ///                  recursively calling itself on the child nodes of the given
00098 ///                  node.
00099 /// @pre             None
00100 /// @post            The given node and all its children have been painted.
00101 ///
00102 /// @param node:     This is a pointer to the node to paint.
00103 /// @param painter:  This is a pointer to the QPainter to use for painting nodes
00104 ///                  to the screen.
00105 ///
00106 /// @limitations     None
00107 ///
00108 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00109 void CTreeNodeArtist::paintModelHelper( const STreeNode *node,
00110                                           QPainter *painter )
00111 {
00112     //Check if the given node has a parent node.  If it does, paint a line from
00113     //the current node to the parent node.
00114     if ( node->s_parent != NULL )
00115         painter->drawLine( node->s_position, node->s_parent->s_position );
00116 
00117     //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00118     //
00119     // Description:   This loop recursively calls this function on
00120     //                all the child nodes of the current node.
00121     //
00122     // Precondition:  None
00123     // Postcondition: All the child nodes of the current node are
00124     //                painted.
00125     //
00126     //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00127     for ( int i = 0; i < node->s_childList.size(); i++ )
00128         paintModelHelper( node->s_childList[i], painter );
00129 
00130     //Paint the current node.
00131     paintNode( node, painter );
00132 }
00133 
00134 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00135 /// CTreeNodeArtist::paintNode
00136 ///
00137 /// @description     This function paints a single node to the screen.  It
00138 ///                  draws the node using the given QPainter object.
00139 /// @pre             None
00140 /// @post            The given node is painted to the screen.
00141 ///
00142 /// @param node:     This is a pointer to the node to be painted to the screen.
00143 /// @param painter:  This is a pointer to the QPainter object to be used to
00144 ///                  paint the node on the screen.
00145 ///
00146 /// @limitations     None
00147 ///
00148 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00149 void CTreeNodeArtist::paintNode( const STreeNode *node,
00150                                    QPainter *painter )
00151 {
00152     //Create a bounding rectangle for the current node.
00153     int radius = m_style->getNodeRadius();
00154     QRect rect( 0, 0, radius * 2, radius * 2 );
00155     rect.moveCenter( node->s_position );
00156 
00157     QPen backupPen = painter->pen();
00158     QPen pen = painter->pen();
00159 
00160     //Make the node appear bolded if it is quiescent.
00161     if ( node->s_quiescent )
00162         pen.setWidth( pen.width() + m_style->getBoldWidth() );
00163     painter->setPen( pen );
00164 
00165     //Draw the circle indicating the node.
00166     painter->drawEllipse( rect );
00167 
00168     //Create the string to appear in the node and draw it.
00169     QString string = node->s_name;
00170     string.append( QString::number( node->s_value ) );
00171     painter->drawText( rect, Qt::AlignCenter, string );
00172     painter->setPen( backupPen );
00173 }

00185 ///
00186 /// @limitations   None
00187 ///
00188 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00189 void CTreeNodeArtist::setModel( CTreeGraphModel *model )
00190 {
00191     m_model = model;
00192 }
